alert.note: Alert for Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seward and southwestern Meade Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Tice to near Turpin. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
